cards.name: Black Seraph’s Glare
cards.short: Damage foes to make a demoralization attempt as a free action with a +4 profane bonus.
cards.description: Disciples of the Black Seraph know that half the battle is won through the mind, and by attacking his opponent’s mind with fear, he can goad him to make mistakes and shatter his resolve and confidence. While in this stance, the disciple may make Intimidate checks to demoralize foes as a free action, but only against those that he has damaged that turn. He gains a +4 profane bonus (see Intimidate skill description for details) to these Intimidate checks.
